bioconda.name: bioconductor-biovizbase
bioconda.summary: Basic graphic utilities for visualization of genomic data.

biotools.summary: This package is designed to provide a set of utilities, color schemes and conventions for genomic data. It serves as the base for various high-level packages for biological data visualization, saving development effort and encouraging consistency.

bioschemas.name: biovizBase
bioschemas.summary: This package is designed to provide a set of utilities, color schemes and conventions for genomic data. It serves as the base for various high-level packages for biological data visualization, saving development effort and encouraging consistency.
